overview: Ahmed Mumtaz is a simple employee who invented a kind of cloth that does not burn. He presents his innovation to his direct boss who, in turn, presents him to the highest manager. He goes to meet with the general manager in his house with his colleague. The manager realizes the truth, Ahmed tries to prove to the manager that he is the owner of the invention and a confrontation between the employee and the millionaire, ends in favor of the millionaire, Ahmed, who marries his beloved b Remember that the manager knew the truth about the invention.
title: ليالى الحب
